data.name: The Hunt
data.detailed_description:
Challenge your reflexes in this high speed high action combat racing game.
Hunt wanted war criminals, raid automated mining facilities, race other head-hunters & scavenge for scraps to upgrade your hunter-craft & reach new racing tracks in the decaying remains of a once glorious civilization.


Engage in high speed high action exiting combat, Hunt war criminals & raid automated mining facilities


Compete against other head-hunters in precise high speed races through tight riverbeds and canyons


Defy gravity using the game’s unique flight mechanic


Collect loot, upgrade your Hunter-Craft & reach new lands

Upgrade & customize your Hunter-Craft

Discover new lands & racing tracks

The game takes place in the far far future where scattered human colonies are surviving on the decay & remains of a once glorious multi-planetary civilization.
Some daredevil head-hunters are roaming the lawless galaxy in their Hunter-Crafts, hunting wanted war-criminals of the old world, scavenging for scraps, raiding automated mining facilities & racing each other, all in the pursuit of a quick profit, great thrills and sometimes justice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

release_date.date: Well, it's really too early to say
